name: Nasty Trip
description:
The house is unfinished and abandoned. Three floors of walls and holes. Alcoholics, addicts and hobos love this place, the rest of the people - not so much. What can possibly be the reason? And why no one finishes the building? Clearly, a dark power involved. This must be the forest near the building, and all the evil spirits living in there.

The game is pretty short, only three floors of enemies, can be finished in minutes once you adapt to the pace and placement.

This game is made in Leadwerks engine, and the only thing that is not made by me is weapons. Also it has primitive saving system, which was implemented because I doubted if the game will run without any crashes. So you can continue from the last level if something happens or you just need to exit.
